newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: Australia Yield Spreads - Outperforming the bloc.
newsitem.headline: Australia Yield Spreads - Outperforming the bloc.

text.p: The Australian bond market proved the star within the dollar bloc on the return from the Easter break, and in particular outperformed the short end of the Canadian curve.

Local yields spiked sharply initially in sympathy with weakness seen in U.S. Treasuries seen either side of Easter amid continued concerns that the Federal Reserve will have to tighten policy again to prevent an inflation break out.

However, positive local fundamentals stopped domestic yields over shooting the U.S. move, and the short-end remains protected by the prospect of Reserve Bank keeping policy on hold for some months to come, analysts said.
However, Canadian bonds underperformed against the U.S. on Monday as the Canadian dollar remained under pressure in the aftermath of last week's 25 basis point tightening by the U.S. Fed.
